study_variables.name: Fault Type
study_variables.description: Describes the kind of fault detected in the system.

study_variables.name: Fault Position
study_variables.description: Indicates the physical location of the fault.

study_variables.name: Fault Severity
study_variables.description: Measures the impact or intensity of the fault.

study_variables.name: Motor Speed
study_variables.description: The rotational speed of the motor.

study_variables.name: Discharge Pressure
study_variables.description: Pressure at the discharge point of the system.

study_variables.name: Volumetric Flow Rate
study_variables.description: The volumetric flow rate through the system.

processing_protocols.name: Filter Type
processing_protocols.description: Describes the filter type used for data processing of sensor data.

processing_protocols.name: Chunk Size
processing_protocols.description: Specifies the chunk size used in data processing of sensor data.

processing_protocols.name: Scaling Range
processing_protocols.description: Specifies the scaling range used in data processing of sensor data.

processing_protocols.name: Scaling Resolution
processing_protocols.description: Specifies the scaling resolution used in data processing of sensor data.

processing_protocols.name: Other Resolution
processing_protocols.description: Another resolution for processing sensor data
